subject: You need to complete the finance application for your Howdens order

rows.text: We noticed that you currently haven't completed the finance application for the purchase of your Howdens goods from {{extras.trader.trading_name}}. Click below to choose which finance option you want to apply for and complete the application. You'll receive a decision in a few minutes and we'll keep both your builder and Howdens updated.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at howdens@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.
